<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PA4Id9ViBo5YkVxNfkvlHT3Pgqe">2025 年是 AI Agent 的元年，我们团队历时 3 个多月，现正式开源Multi-Agent AI 框架，欢迎各位园友前往 GitHub Fork、Star 或提交 PR，共同打造 aevatar.ai 生态。</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PA4Id9ViBo5YkVxNfkvlHT3Pgqe">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PA4Id9ViBo5YkVxNfkvlHT3Pgqe">Github地址：&nbsp;</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PA4Id9ViBo5YkVxNfkvlHT3Pgqe"><span class="break-words          tvm-parent-container"><span dir="ltr">aevatar 核心框架:<span class="white-space-pre">&nbsp;<a href="https://github.com/aevatarAI/aevatar-framework" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/aevatarAI/aevatar-framework&nbsp;</a><br>aevatar平台:<span class="white-space-pre">&nbsp;<a href="https://github.com/aevatarAI/aevatar-station" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/aevatarAI/aevatar-station</a><br>aevatar 案例:<span class="white-space-pre">&nbsp;<a href="https://github.com/aevatarAI/aevatar-gagents" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/aevatarAI/aevatar-gagents</a><br></span></span></span></span></span></div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PA4Id9ViBo5YkVxNfkvlHT3Pgqe">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PA4Id9ViBo5YkVxNfkvlHT3Pgqe">aevatar.ai，一个统一的多智能体平台，旨在解决跨领域和多样化工作负载下开发、部署和管理多种AI智能体的复杂性。通过基于插件的方法和灵活的部署策略——从基于DLL的加载到容器化和分布式执行框架——aevatar.ai允许用户和开发者在一个统一的生态系统中无缝集成专业化的AI解决方案。</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PA4Id9ViBo5YkVxNfkvlHT3Pgqe">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-NsySdaI0ooKrsTx2PStlvybvgUd">关键组件包括：aevatar框架，定义了标准化的智能体接口和生命周期管理；aevatar Station，一个集中化的门户和市场，用于智能体发现、插件处理、请求路由和用户访问控制；以及aevatar Agents，一个包含官方和社区开发的AI模块的仓库，支持多种任务，如自然语言理解、计算机视觉和推荐系统。通过集中化智能体交互和事件流，aevatar.ai减少了集成开销，强制执行一致的安全策略，并提供强大的监控和日志功能以提高可靠性。</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-NsySdaI0ooKrsTx2PStlvybvgUd">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-C56XdVHeioOWNgxnKqbl0Hk6gMh">通过其开源、模块化的架构，aevatar.ai既适用于小规模使用，也支持大规模企业部署，具备高并发、自动扩展、智能体重用、沙箱化和审计追踪等功能。这些创新促进了一个可持续的AI生态系统，使组织能够快速采用和发展先进的AI能力，同时让开发者专注于创建强大、专业化的智能体，而无需担心基础设施和生命周期管理的复杂性。</div>
<ol class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-NQiwdIrw0oDfP3xU79xlgAZugaf" start="1">
<li data-list="number">
<h1>引言 (Introduction)






</h1>


</li>









</ol>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-E2V6d1j1Lo4jiFxgFYNlJBNWgPf">随着人工智能（AI）技术的快速发展，大型语言模型（LLMs）和智能体的应用已从单一问答交互演变为更高级的能力，如多智能体协作、跨模型合作和复杂业务流程编排。</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Uc9bdnUIbox1ISxwBlslfC1Vgmd">然而，目前市场上的AI系统普遍面临平台隔离、模型限制、部署复杂和缺乏可观测性等问题，难以满足企业用户对高效、灵活和安全AI协作的需求。</div>
<div class="image-uploaded gallery old-record-id-Ek1PdLQKno6cPYxIYZ7lk6xrgbf" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="{&quot;items&quot;:[{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;fe3136be-6f30-4e0e-88be-d4b86dd9e759&quot;,&quot;height&quot;:830,&quot;width&quot;:1280,&quot;currHeight&quot;:830,&quot;currWidth&quot;:1280,&quot;natrualHeight&quot;:830,&quot;natrualWidth&quot;:1280,&quot;pluginName&quot;:&quot;imageUpload&quot;,&quot;scale&quot;:1,&quot;src&quot;:&quot;https%3A%2F%2Finternal-api-drive-stream-sg.larksuite.com%2Fspace%2Fapi%2Fbox%2Fstream%2Fdownload%2Fpreview%2FQvXibuYHBoEL4sxtjcml7gMvgRh%2F%3Fpreview_type%3D16&quot;,&quot;file_token&quot;:&quot;QvXibuYHBoEL4sxtjcml7gMvgRh&quot;,&quot;image_type&quot;:&quot;image/png&quot;,&quot;size&quot;:145745,&quot;comments&quot;:[]}]}"><img src="https://whitepaper.aevatar.ai/assets/introduction-fig-1.7Nbh3Lxs.png" width="936" height="604"></div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-TurYdRkbjo4aFixRNkKljCwUgNu">aevatar.ai作为下一代多AI智能体框架的先行者，旨在构建一个跨平台、跨模型的AI智能体生态系统。通过开放的架构、强大的可视化编排能力和云原生部署方式，它赋能开发者和业务用户在一个系统中统一管理、调度和协调多个智能体，实现“多场景、多模型、多角色”的高效协作。</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-GhOhdbXAFoCX5zxkm1olJVUbgCh">通过aevatar.ai，我们致力于提供一个灵活、可扩展且符合安全要求的AI解决方案，以推动AI技术的广泛应用和落地。</div>
<div class=" old-record-id-ZvJodzWSqoF0yOx8PNdl5NFigZe" data-type="divider"><hr></div>
<ol class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-ImTldf3l7o7l39xk1bjl09F2gib" start="2">
<li data-list="number">
<h1 class="heading-1">背景与挑战 (Background &amp; Challenges)</h1>







</li>







</ol><img src="https://whitepaper.aevatar.ai/assets/background-and-challenges-fig-1.CWDIWHSv.jpeg" width="811" height="710">
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-Zyg3dMhEioC8AvxAJWglfGtkgNh">2.1 AI智能体系统隔离</h2>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-D2Nhdssu1o8r1kxZHiAlHR8xg8c">目前，许多AI智能体被隔离在各自的平台中，缺乏统一的通信协议和互操作性。这使得系统之间难以共享数据或协同工作，限制了AI系统的整体效能，尤其是在需要跨平台协作的场景中。</div>
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-NvizdZSDxoCY6yx7IKXl5404gph">2.2 单一LLM的局限性</h2>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-DB4FdwiP9oXXDExVcHal268ggqc">大多数AI智能体依赖于单一的语言模型（如GPT-4或Llama2）。这带来了集中风险；在面对复杂的多步骤任务或多语言场景时，性能可能会受到影响。</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Ezk0dk9wGoHUVyxXAVIlQKMpgrb">单一LLM模型的局限性使得系统无法灵活切换或并行使用多个模型，从而限制了其应用范围和性能。</div>
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-HFsDdVz74oN1rDxCFd7lCchugef">2.3 检索增强生成（RAG）精度不足</h2>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-TUBVdxNsro2xnTxfS4SlwsfHgHc">大多数AI智能体使用检索增强生成从专业知识库中检索信息，但由于信息或文档可能不相关、过时或质量低下，难以实现完美的知识库优化和准确性。</div>
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-GM4BdFCAxonVYHx0RKGlZdiGgyq">2.4 缺乏事件追踪与可观测性</h2>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-BQnmdLKbwoIn0cx3h7BlJP0pg6g">现有的AI系统通常缺乏对AI智能体内部状态和历史交互的源头管理。当系统故障或推理异常发生时，难以定位问题并重放事件，增加了维护复杂性和风险。</div>
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-ZwxcdwZiSouD1MxnrZsloGHHgxf">2.5 高部署与协作成本</h2>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-JC3adzJ6EoTcSGxGExKl0qlLgfh">传统的AI系统通常需要复杂的安装、配置和维护过程。缺乏用户友好的工作流编排工具，尤其是在多智能体协作场景中，导致开发和维护成本较高。</div>
<ol class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-XRw0d23a7oVLrLxr1zhlcRukgyf" start="3">
<li data-list="number">
<h1 class="heading-1">总体目标与愿景 (Vision &amp; Goals)</h1>









</li>









</ol>
<div class="image-uploaded gallery old-record-id-OYR9dimVOo23O0x111BlwmmlgUb" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="{&quot;items&quot;:[{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;3e97edfd-7d1b-4592-87ea-0fd05ad16a09&quot;,&quot;height&quot;:978,&quot;width&quot;:1280,&quot;currHeight&quot;:978,&quot;currWidth&quot;:1280,&quot;natrualHeight&quot;:978,&quot;natrualWidth&quot;:1280,&quot;pluginName&quot;:&quot;imageUpload&quot;,&quot;scale&quot;:1,&quot;src&quot;:&quot;https%3A%2F%2Finternal-api-drive-stream-sg.larksuite.com%2Fspace%2Fapi%2Fbox%2Fstream%2Fdownload%2Fpreview%2FRYMmbyzGIoPLFlx0Nb8lkvA0g3V%2F%3Fpreview_type%3D16&quot;,&quot;file_token&quot;:&quot;RYMmbyzGIoPLFlx0Nb8lkvA0g3V&quot;,&quot;image_type&quot;:&quot;image/png&quot;,&quot;size&quot;:365400,&quot;comments&quot;:[]}]}"><img src="https://whitepaper.aevatar.ai/assets/vision-and-goals-fig-1.Dhr-kl3k.png" width="1431" height="1094" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream-sg.larksuite.com/space/api/box/stream/download/all/RYMmbyzGIoPLFlx0Nb8lkvA0g3V/?mount_node_token=OYR9dimVOo23O0x111BlwmmlgUb&amp;mount_point=docx_image" data-width="1280" data-height="978" data-lark-image-uri="drivetoken://RYMmbyzGIoPLFlx0Nb8lkvA0g3V" data-lark-image-width="1280" data-lark-image-height="978"></div>
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-YbnPdN4W0oIz2HxkwnNlWCuJg0e">3.1 核心：aevatar框架</h2>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-H71hdiRYxonIpOxdAf4lD6UYgEc">aevatar框架是aevatar.ai的核心，负责处理基本处理逻辑、智能体交互和核心组件。</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Z4PGdIsGyox1WexivlDlUfLKgvb"><strong>Orleans“Grains”作为智能体</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-KEE5dWkmfoBbQRxkaxvlehQUghd" data-list="bullet">Orleans使用“grains”（轻量级、隔离的微对象）来表示参与者或“智能体”。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-ARboda9BboPGM7xScPJlSqJigJg" data-list="bullet">一组silos（Orleans中的运行时主机）协调这些grains，使其可以分布在多台服务器上并进行扩展。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-NQsmd3yeHoLHqHxyQB6lrdJagOd" data-list="bullet">在此架构中，每个grain实际上是一个智能体（通常称为“GAgent”）。</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-YBOPdc6bpo19NvxYJxlly76HgLe"><strong>多智能体</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Z944dUGdQohb9qxx2TWlvRfagLe" data-list="bullet">图中展示了多层智能体分组。例如，一个“发布GAgent”协调多个“组成员GAgent”实例。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EGchdYmIMo9cOIxRnaLlxoWHgOb" data-list="bullet">事件处理器管理异步触发器或状态变化，使智能体能够实时响应来自其他智能体的数据或更新。</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Mpj6dVKUPoigf6xUt4Klcewhgqd"><strong>AI集成</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Bjt1d8tBLoRJb9x0uSEl85PBg6c" data-list="bullet">Semantic Kernel提供高级AI编排和提示链功能。</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-CmbcdRZx2oge4OxECFKl6W1JgkI">通过结合以上所有内容，系统可以扩展大量AI智能体，每个智能体执行专门任务，同时通过分组或子组协调它们以实现更复杂的协作目标。</div>
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-ZOd8d3nfko3r7WxBoWflnlHOgxb">3.2 顶层：aevatar应用</h2>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-YPibdSv9vosdCzxUHhUlWm0SgHd" data-list="bullet"><strong>市场</strong>：一个集中化的平台，用户可以发现、开发、管理和部署各种AI智能体。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-SXiAd4LGwobhJZxfuS7l6ZgLgka" data-list="bullet"><strong>智能体</strong>：执行特定任务或功能的独立AI智能体。这些智能体可以独立开发和部署。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EQVndY2R6ouzGYxZI11lRwo6gEw" data-list="bullet"><strong>Webhook</strong>：aevatar可以无缝编排大量外部输入，将现实世界的触发器转换为结构化事件，供G-agent处理，从而实现与各种外部系统的持续、实时交互。</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Mh5HdOF4NoELO8xgY0wl3j5ogtb"><strong>示例智能体</strong>：</div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-R0tzdwtozoWARnxt6hSlYabtg2f" data-list="bullet"><strong>Twitter智能体</strong>：监控推文、发布更新或与Twitter互动。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-IMEsdSzAroL5vpxFWH1l3lC7gNc" data-list="bullet"><strong>Telegram智能体</strong>：与Telegram进行聊天交互。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Snk7dIrc4oGHoQxTTMBlj8y8gEb" data-list="bullet"><strong>编程智能体</strong>：帮助生成或审查代码。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-T6p3denMPobTvKxxSPmlTL24ghc" data-list="bullet"><strong>营销智能体</strong>：执行营销任务，如活动管理。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-X7PhdOPO6oJh69x824dlfl5KgAb" data-list="bullet"><strong>运营智能体</strong>：处理运营任务。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-MM3SdJr24oxGg0xjRhWlfPIkg3c" data-list="bullet"><strong>aelf智能体</strong>等。</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-YRxodLBIjonCG5xHdIvlamwLgeh">这些是基于底层多智能体框架构建的面向终端用户的“产品”。每个智能体都可以具有专门的逻辑，连接外部API，并利用aevatar核心引擎。</div>
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-PRzId8u2MoPxlZxIn3kl7C6Wg3c">3.3 环境（Web 2 / Web 3）</h2>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Ui5zdlgtpokm1Uxz6GXl37LNglh">这表示aevatar智能体运行的更广泛环境——既包括传统的Web 2.0环境（如REST API、SaaS服务），也包括Web 3.0环境（如区块链或去中心化服务）。该框架旨在无缝融入这些生态系统。</div>
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-LfvldjRqcoSmgYxHVHSlBJpHgZd">3.4 LLM集成</h2>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Pnkadx8uzo0G2ZxjFHHl11gGgTc">在图的右侧，您可以看到主要的LLM（大型语言模型）提供商：</div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Ib36dV9rGoIDyDx8VAhlPsljgMf" data-list="bullet">OpenAI / ChatGPT</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-AOYpdngzOo6zdoxYDfJlEWCBg8e" data-list="bullet">Anthropic</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-WXUfd69kXoZ401xJgOQlBiALgxg" data-list="bullet">Meta</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-E1nldPBAyotRtsx5JXMlSOzjgEg" data-list="bullet">Azure OpenAI</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-NYbod2pylodMD8xxNMMlnNQ9gsb" data-list="bullet">Deepseek</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-UyzddRmCXosLb1xK1X3lroUagBe" data-list="bullet">以及其他更多…</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-SMFvdMPSlotxY0xBuZGlChPNgsh">这些LLM通过Semantic Kernel连接器集成，使每个智能体都能利用自然语言理解、生成和高级推理功能。</div>
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-CiYTdeMMaoOjFux8OkKlj3xWgqh">3.5 数据与消息层</h2>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-MX99d2SqsojJ2HxfaqVlsKzZgJg">在框架之上，核心数据与消息技术包括：</div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Fa9jdGfU5o8TECxYDZnlJVyBgca" data-list="bullet"><strong>Kafka</strong>：实时消息传递和事件流。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-H9sadpKp0opMoexi1iJlB4R4g0e" data-list="bullet"><strong>MongoDB</strong>：基于文档的通用数据存储。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-F5y5dlZtroioQuxq62rlXWrxgrf" data-list="bullet"><strong>Elasticsearch</strong>：大规模全文搜索和分析。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Bk11da4AuovzxqxOWy1lNQCggro" data-list="bullet"><strong>Redis</strong>：用于缓存和高速访问的内存数据存储。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-HXRbdjc20ofcqyxnSNLlPVKMgwe" data-list="bullet"><strong>Qdrant</strong>：专用向量存储。</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-MjxUdjI4Poj2IsxXkiFlaxlggVd">这些技术支持高吞吐量的数据摄取、搜索、缓存和状态管理，对于大规模智能体交互至关重要。</div>
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-FSP1d5E6xoIadRxs6BjlJiRvgQh">3.6 部署与DevSecOps</h2>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-UcfidOGBKoaEYMxuEM3lxHQfgxh">用于构建、部署和管理aevatar框架的DevSecOps工具包括：</div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-G4EFdcBWMoFgzDx4KlRlhSKugkd" data-list="bullet"><strong>Kubernetes + Docker</strong>：跨集群的容器化和编排。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-SAWKds7SfoulsBx5wK5lq9gRgrc" data-list="bullet"><strong>GitHub Actions, GitOps, Argo</strong>：CI/CD管道和“GitOps”风格的部署，用于自动化、版本化发布。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-DKuVdXfTjotxajx3DMSldDVugKg" data-list="bullet">“DevSecOps”循环突出了以安全为中心的持续集成/持续部署实践。</li>









</ul>
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-XJ5EdlKQqoAhmIxcLHYlGvOVgXc">3.7 多云与安全</h2>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-BegldL46woL7T2xtuPMlUWmMgpg">最后，支持多云策略，涵盖：</div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EMzGdDp0yoT4lOxKzbzluAIWgob" data-list="bullet"><strong>GCP、AWS、Azure</strong>：支持的云服务提供商。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-ViHRdYAKroB5ygx6ZBKl4JkBgwe" data-list="bullet">额外的安全和可观测性工具，如Grafana（监控仪表板）、Vault（密钥管理）、Elasticsearch/Fluentd/Kibana（EFK日志和分析堆栈）等。</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-QSCudHQKqoDHyBxcT5QlbxVIgOh">这确保了平台可以在不同云基础设施上以安全、容错和成本高效的方式运行。</div>
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-QrqadGN1soqen1x8QM3lhlMDgIc">3.8 整体架构</h2>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EILUdecfXoOtaQxRi8flevjJgFg" data-list="bullet">每个aevatar应用（如Twitter智能体或编程智能体）都是一个Orleans“grain”（或一组grains），封装了专门的逻辑。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-BTsfd6T1Eo4Ia2xLFloljXi7gNe" data-list="bullet">多智能体或“分组”方法协调大量grains，使它们能够通过Kafka、Redis或直接Orleans消息传递相互传递事件/消息。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-DqCndluQxoyhcAxK8nelru2igff" data-list="bullet">Semantic Kernel帮助编排更高级的AI推理、提示链和记忆/知识。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Vcued8mh6oxlNmxXQ6ulK4Leg1g" data-list="bullet">整个设置打包用于云部署（Kubernetes + Docker），并与日志、安全和监控解决方案（Grafana、Vault、EFK）集成。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-KQn0dU5teoZncaxWADNlBxMpgrg" data-list="bullet">这种组合提供了一个可扩展、容错且高度可扩展的平台，用于在多个领域（Web 2和Web 3）、多个云上运行AI智能体，同时具备强大的安全性和可观测性。</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-DW3cdngiIolOJOx0jKdlqNaag7f">简而言之，aevatar.ai是一个全栈、云原生的多智能体编排框架，利用Orleans实现基于参与者的扩展，集成Semantic Kernel以提供AI功能，并采用全面的DevSecOps管道和多云部署策略。</div>

<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-WWp7dqjb5oEef4xhK3tlYrCggob" data-list="number"><strong>可持续性</strong>：独立维护每个智能体的知识库，便于分而治之。</li>









</ol>

<li data-list="number">
<h2 class="heading-2">aevatar框架</h2>









</li>









</ol>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EihadD3ulofUeYxl4c6lb5Omg0c"><strong>aevatar</strong>框架旨在支持AI智能体和事件溯源机制，提供模块化架构以实现可扩展性和可维护性。它利用依赖注入和观察者模式等设计模式来增强灵活性和可扩展性。</div>
<div class="image-uploaded gallery old-record-id-TIevdFE1Go1ic6xBPWalKWAzgxf" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="{&quot;items&quot;:[{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;dd32d252-a146-4895-a458-e8a5430d05d5&quot;,&quot;height&quot;:1792,&quot;width&quot;:1614,&quot;currHeight&quot;:1792,&quot;currWidth&quot;:1614,&quot;natrualHeight&quot;:1792,&quot;natrualWidth&quot;:1614,&quot;pluginName&quot;:&quot;imageUpload&quot;,&quot;scale&quot;:1,&quot;src&quot;:&quot;https%3A%2F%2Finternal-api-drive-stream-sg.larksuite.com%2Fspace%2Fapi%2Fbox%2Fstream%2Fdownload%2Fpreview%2FCkPibpD9WoqwYXxiEF0lVthwgHh%2F%3Fpreview_type%3D16&quot;,&quot;file_token&quot;:&quot;CkPibpD9WoqwYXxiEF0lVthwgHh&quot;,&quot;image_type&quot;:&quot;image/jpeg&quot;,&quot;size&quot;:199180,&quot;comments&quot;:[]}]}"><img src="https://whitepaper.aevatar.ai/assets/architecture-fig-2.6-a_O059.jpg" width="1412" height="1582" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream-sg.larksuite.com/space/api/box/stream/download/all/CkPibpD9WoqwYXxiEF0lVthwgHh/?mount_node_token=TIevdFE1Go1ic6xBPWalKWAzgxf&amp;mount_point=docx_image" data-width="1614" data-height="1792" data-lark-image-uri="drivetoken://CkPibpD9WoqwYXxiEF0lVthwgHh" data-lark-image-width="1614" data-lark-image-height="1792"></div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-GZRddQWHpoXVQNxsmWmljkbTgjb"><strong>设计原则</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EJ5FdYrUboPhJyxNm0hl8uhLg9c" data-list="bullet"><strong>模块化</strong>：框架设计为模块化，允许开发者根据需要添加或移除组件。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-CHcddBeSlojtrRx5K0KlbDRngtf" data-list="bullet"><strong>可扩展性</strong>：新功能可以通过插件添加，而无需修改核心框架。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-GoXhdCAI3o3GbSxYl2fl21mkg9g" data-list="bullet"><strong>关注点分离</strong>：每个组件都有特定的职责，提升可维护性和可读性。</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Vv3AdqueUoMQWKxEqqtldj4GgLg">该框架为开发AI智能体和事件溯源应用提供了灵活的架构，通过其模块化设计实现轻松集成和扩展。通过遵循设计原则和模式，框架确保在添加新功能时仍能保持可扩展性和可维护性。</div>
<ol class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EXRidnOp6o6GufxB6mglhIPqgkg" start="2">
<li data-list="number">
<h2 class="heading-2">核心组件概述</h2>









</li>









</ol>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-UxYHd21IQo3Z07x9uo1lD1oMgSf"><strong>参与者模型（Actor Model）</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PvDOdSfGPow4X8xgriHl6UYOgVd" data-list="bullet">负责管理分布式参与者（Grain）的生命周期和通信，为每个智能体提供有状态且可重放的执行环境，确保系统的高并发性和可扩展性。</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-XD1kdxBTaoRwCGxEsiHlhc7Rg1e"><strong>GAgent</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-YkdydO8cjovY7MxLJ4bl4cgDgWd" data-list="bullet">每个子模块（如Telegram、Twitter、MicroAI、SocialAgent等）都是一个独立的GAgent，针对不同平台或场景实现特定的智能体逻辑，支持跨平台扩展。</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-ZQSidMej6o0DRHxQoz2lJVLygWf"><strong>事件溯源（Event Sourcing）</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-XYLedAcpXo39rrxAgk4llGD4gxc" data-list="bullet">提供日志存储、事件重放和快照管理的核心功能。支持多种后端存储选项（如MongoDB和Redis），并确保系统的可追溯性和审计能力。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-K6GOdIKhqof4TqxdPJjl1DNvgMf" data-list="bullet">所有关键的智能体事件（如接收的消息、状态更新、模型推理输出）都可以持久化，提供重放和审计能力。</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-UB37dXNSloz5lDxxMvOleD3pgbh"><strong>CQRS（命令查询职责分离）</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Hanqd6ANsoT63exGP1vlMTSjgVe" data-list="bullet">对外提供REST/gRPC接口，并通过读写分离架构支持高效的内部数据查询和索引。结合Elasticsearch等解决方案，实现大规模数据的快速检索。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-LmPNd5kdUoksxYxOhHGlRbj5gCf" data-list="bullet">读写分离：系统可以独立处理智能体状态变更的写请求（事件）和外部查询接口。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-K1ysdLWCSoArgMxvvZIlRpLvgLd" data-list="bullet">结合Elasticsearch/MongoDB实现快速检索和多维度查询。</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-QVDUddXv2oqdcEx8Ichl3SCFgLc"><strong>aevatar仪表板</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-U44yd4winoUZZ5xbU4ylBhCtghb" data-list="bullet">图形化管理工具，允许用户通过低代码/无代码方式配置多智能体协作流程、监控事件流并编辑业务逻辑。这显著降低了开发门槛，尤其对非技术用户友好。</li>









</ul>
<ol class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-M3Mpd0eTYohYxZxxrBnltWTSg1T" start="3">
<li data-list="number">
<h2 class="heading-2">GAgent多智能体协作模型</h2>









</li>









</ol>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-GN4Advxo0oytj5xfsiKl4m6Og6g" data-list="bullet">采用<code>GAgentBase&lt;TState, TEvent&gt;</code>作为抽象基类，智能体可以继承并实现自己的业务处理方法。</li>









</ul>

<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-WxDIdOg0QohqOOxMTOIlxilKgdZ" data-list="bullet"><strong>调度策略</strong>：根据任务类型、资源成本、复杂性等维度动态决定调用哪些模型。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-WiNPdlU3qoYSF5xtp1qlqEzwgYc" data-list="bullet"><strong>模型适配层</strong>：在框架层面支持连接更多第三方或私有模型，为企业提供定制化的多语言模型管理。</li>









</ul>

<ol class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-ABe0d1Ny8o6GwixM8jwl0Qsxg2f" start="5">

<h1 class="heading-1">技术细节</h1>









</li>









</ol>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-HQwCd0scYoAfmUx9IyHlTlUog3d"><strong>整体流程</strong>：</div>
<ol class="list-number1" start="1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-BxyqdT21voKOL5xmjEMlGfi6gtd" data-list="number"><strong>用户 → aevatar GAgent</strong>：捕获用户的消息或命令。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-GTyvdZLtIo9KvPxt2gOlgM2bg4F" data-list="number"><strong>GAgent → aevatar框架</strong>：将结构化事件传递给框架（多智能体协作和AI交互）。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-XrvZdltV2orxrjxdjPilvBdXgnf" data-list="number"><strong>aevatar框架 → 核心逻辑（RAG和LLM）</strong>：RAG和LLM解析请求。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Tuwqds5yUo3qAxxqMAxlAYckgGe" data-list="number"><strong>核心逻辑（RAG和LLM）→ 外部服务或知识/记忆库</strong>：检索数据或调用专门操作。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-AQwxdlbPcowvahxSt0jlT9haglf" data-list="number"><strong>aevatar框架 → 输出代理</strong>：格式化并准备最终输出。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-FTWrdOHUSoXagOxtKCKlU7GxgEe" data-list="number"><strong>输出 → GAgent → 用户</strong>：用户收到响应。</li>









</ol>
<div class="image-uploaded gallery old-record-id-SCEidHdi6oM1h2xUsqjl1tO6g3b" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="{&quot;items&quot;:[{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;9c566b73-2ed0-455d-a617-28542e0f989f&quot;,&quot;height&quot;:720,&quot;width&quot;:1640,&quot;currHeight&quot;:720,&quot;currWidth&quot;:1640,&quot;natrualHeight&quot;:720,&quot;natrualWidth&quot;:1640,&quot;pluginName&quot;:&quot;imageUpload&quot;,&quot;scale&quot;:1,&quot;src&quot;:&quot;https%3A%2F%2Finternal-api-drive-stream-sg.larksuite.com%2Fspace%2Fapi%2Fbox%2Fstream%2Fdownload%2Fpreview%2FHdBcbYd3xoajE0xz4oRlpkdTg3c%2F%3Fpreview_type%3D16&quot;,&quot;file_token&quot;:&quot;HdBcbYd3xoajE0xz4oRlpkdTg3c&quot;,&quot;image_type&quot;:&quot;image/jpeg&quot;,&quot;size&quot;:86314,&quot;comments&quot;:[]}]}"><img src="https://whitepaper.aevatar.ai/assets/technical-fig-1.Czoewzuf.jpeg" width="1429" height="589" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream-sg.larksuite.com/space/api/box/stream/download/all/HdBcbYd3xoajE0xz4oRlpkdTg3c/?mount_node_token=SCEidHdi6oM1h2xUsqjl1tO6g3b&amp;mount_point=docx_image" data-width="1640" data-height="720" data-lark-image-uri="drivetoken://HdBcbYd3xoajE0xz4oRlpkdTg3c" data-lark-image-width="1640" data-lark-image-height="720"></div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-S9xtdzqhZobZwDxxClnlLaqrgug"><strong>详细流程</strong>：</div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-AzrUdL1XMooqP4xnjTKlA7tcgkh" data-list="bullet"><strong>智能体创建与初始化</strong>：客户端请求GAgentFactory创建智能体，智能体使用StateLogEventStorage初始化状态，并通过StreamProvider设置订阅。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Akexdct7toaWVjxTKS9lPKLEgfe" data-list="bullet"><strong>事件发布与处理</strong>：客户端（或其他系统）向智能体发布事件，智能体将事件追加到事件存储中，更新其内存状态，并在必要时发布到外部流。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-RDLQdg49Wok5nfxzRBKlXrLcgqf" data-list="bullet"><strong>状态恢复</strong>：在需要时，智能体从存储中检索快照，并应用所有后续事件，最终获得最新状态。</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-IwhUdJqQyo4TgKxvF7jlJ8qPgfc"><strong>显著特点与优势</strong>：</div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-NBtCdL5E5oqW9Jxk1pDlU8QXgxb" data-list="bullet"><strong>多智能体协作</strong>：系统可以将复杂任务拆分为更小的专门子任务，每个任务由适当的智能体处理。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-MQPGd1Nvjo93R0xLun2larA5gyh" data-list="bullet"><strong>动态流程</strong>：智能体按需激活和调用（虚拟参与者模型），允许在任务可拆分的场景中实现并发或并行调用。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-TB26dtWawoEspixt9iJlXr42gCb" data-list="bullet"><strong>与外部服务集成</strong>：知识模块可以无缝整合实时数据、领域文档或高级处理能力。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-JXjNdmwnfobkLrxafF1lD5BKgGg" data-list="bullet"><strong>检索增强生成（RAG）</strong>：智能体可以查询向量数据库或记忆存储，利用最新的上下文数据增强LLM或其他逻辑。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-V33YdKyQXoTjo8xkqsKlYFJGg2d" data-list="bullet"><strong>可扩展性与扩展性</strong>：每个组件都可以水平扩展，新的智能体或工具可以在不改变主要架构的情况下引入。</li>









</ul>
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-AqFSd2dAaoDwLXxKWBXlB2gkgSd">5.1 Orleans参与者模型与可扩展性</h2>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-YDXldDP5po4EsCxo5dHl7kOZgsf" data-list="bullet"><strong>分布式参与者</strong>：每个智能体作为一个Grain，存储自己的状态和事件历史。Orleans处理调度和消息传递，消除了手动管理并发锁和网络通信的需求。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-RoLSdi1GYoA3LvxQVBwlHyCcglb" data-list="bullet"><strong>水平扩展</strong>：当系统需要处理更多对话或更高并发时，添加Silo节点可以扩展智能体实例并自动平衡负载。</li>









</ul>
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-War4dpsUHoLliuxTT5jl1XDBgWd">5.2 GAgentBase设计与事件驱动架构</h2>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Eswhddbv5oDU5uxUXJsle7mYghh" data-list="bullet">
<div><strong>GAgentBase&lt;TState, TStateLogEvent&gt;</strong>：</div>
<ul class="list-bullet2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-XqNfdSfCtoGnlNxsGFQlXLswg5e" data-list="bullet">继承<code>JournaledGrain&lt;TState, StateLogEventBase&lt;TStateLogEvent&gt;&gt;</code>，天然具备事件溯源能力。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-ZvnLdQtPfojr97xBuhwleXGfggc" data-list="bullet">通过<code>PublishToAsync/SubscribeToAsync</code>等方法，允许智能体自由组合和交互，形成多对多或多级事件流拓扑。</li>









</ul>









</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PprBdM0AqojmMqxNz7Kljgvsg6e" data-list="bullet">
<div><strong>EventWrapper</strong>：</div>
<ul class="list-bullet2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EAVAdAZSyoPeQexv26ElZCBjgGg" data-list="bullet">为所有事件添加ID、时间戳和上下文等元数据，便于审计和调试，避免传统“黑箱AI”问题。</li>









</ul>









</li>









</ul>

<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-FJvodDbbooHMipxkEvrltjeRgrr" data-list="bullet"><strong>拖放流程设计</strong>：用户可以在仪表板上拖放智能体节点、配置事件路由并设置模型策略，而无需编写复杂的后端代码。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Uq0Zdga6QobxNOxWEl4la4bkgyb" data-list="bullet"><strong>实时监控与日志重放</strong>：集成事件溯源日志，允许通过aevatar仪表板查看任何时刻的事件序列或智能体状态，帮助业务优化和维护故障排查。</li>









</ul>
<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-ILgTd2IPRo0NXWxXB7zliWfbgQe">5.4 可观测性与监控</h2>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Ue3xdUdsNoyjNuxkjUFlHCfAgHf" data-list="bullet"><strong>分布式追踪</strong>：集成OpenTelemetry、Jaeger或Zipkin，可视化跟踪跨智能体/Grain的调用链。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-P6xjdP2S4omJEwxey47lcRqXgWk" data-list="bullet"><strong>指标与警报</strong>：收集系统指标（如QPS、延迟、错误率等），并基于Prometheus/Grafana实现实时警报。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PzqVdZOeHo0Q48x5z4Ql8XYugXg" data-list="bullet"><strong>Orleans仪表板</strong>：可选的内置Orleans仪表板，显示运行时数据（如Grain激活数量、消息处理速率等）。</li>









</ul>

<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EbahdWXqsoCm0xxicEGlwX3VgZd" data-list="bullet">根据业务需求自动（或手动）在不同LLM之间切换。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Dp1sdTJ5SoyzhNxoD7Jl205PgAd" data-list="bullet">能够分配多个模型同时处理子任务并合并结果。</li>









</ul>

<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-CzkKdcB6Do0drOxcF8clJIyZgCU" data-list="bullet">GAgent提供基于事件的协作机制，允许多个智能体并行处理复杂业务流程。</li>

</ul>

</ul>

<h2 class="heading-2 ace-line old-record-id-FMRkdXTolospXwx8d4QlEhf5gXc">9.2 长期规划</h2>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-KCHFd56yjoufTnx77FyltYmJgxe"><strong>增强的向量检索 (RAG) 能力</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-XUKgdXWG4ogxGQxrieZlL6CvgLb" data-list="bullet">原生支持向量数据库</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-T2fPdDA5KoAviWxtXF4lO3Q1ghc" data-list="bullet">优化海量文档分块检索与 AI 答案生成</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-BdKzddROGoOfKqxPL74leZnugYc"><strong>增强的智能体插件市场</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-BEK5dcZCaoSW1lxnPwnlvukmgGe" data-list="bullet">推出多行业插件生态系统</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-UajZdWfKyojxh9xyyjWlICEKgUg" data-list="bullet">
<div>提供可即插即用的智能体模块，覆盖如：</div>
<ul class="list-bullet2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-BhXEdiBbQoQDVvxeq6TlUl20gbf" data-list="bullet">金融风控</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-RTx1dy2smoh5vlxYa1Dlhwgsg2z" data-list="bullet">供应链管理</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-NHXJdQMAbo2KAoxHIwTlGIKHgUk" data-list="bullet">医疗健康</li>









</ul>









</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EJa7dqtRto92nUxN9mTlhM2Qg5r"><strong>服务网格与零信任安全</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-RZXxdGTtrokxPnxT3wXlx5S8ghc" data-list="bullet">进一步深化服务网格集成</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EojUd2711ol2cnxgzOfluAVig0I" data-list="bullet">加强数据加密、流量管控与访问策略</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-BTIXdLEAXoQyrmxJ4A2lOyN9g0g"><strong>RLHF（基于人类反馈的强化学习）机制</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-QjA2d7sWVoSE6zxKYMalze4Sgvd" data-list="bullet">支持对智能体进行实时人类反馈训练</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-SHIBd9QD0oT5KoxqzVnlBWVdgCs" data-list="bullet">持续优化对话质量、逻辑推理及行为决策</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-S6EgdfrYmo9hjvxJnBcl1VYmgud"><strong>无限的智能体协作</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-XdUUdTnCBoVLsgxhIQclbaragxc" data-list="bullet">探索与第三方 AI 系统及边缘计算设备的互联</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-E5FYdwhinosr6CxqSEllDpmVgFb" data-list="bullet">将多智能体协作从云原生拓展至物联网或其他 AI 智能体平台</li>









</ul>
<ol class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-SQkjdCJC2ocYNIxjjFKlFJM3g77" start="10">
<li data-list="number">
<h1 class="heading-1">总结</h1>









</li>









</ol>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EbyMd5MBJoA7tBxdR3klj1BQgbb">随着多模型、多智能体协作逐渐成为主流，aevatar.ai 作为下一代 AI 智能体经济的先行者，提供了跨平台、跨语言模型、低门槛且高度可扩展的解决方案。</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Tg3cdL2gCo2faexDketlTYSbg3g">通过充分利用 Orleans Actor 模型、事件溯源以及云原生架构，aevatar.ai 实现了以下核心价值：</div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Y7QKdwH2ZoWQLFxYWROlOEvVgJe" data-list="bullet"><strong>全面的多智能体协作</strong>：突破单一模型和封闭生态的限制，让不同 AI 智能体之间实现信息共享与高效通信。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-MuljdEsZGo3WMWx9Ob9lzrpZgod" data-list="bullet"><strong>可视化与低代码</strong>：大幅降低开发和维护门槛，帮助不同层级的用户快速落地 AI 智能体解决方案。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-CPrXd38DGorqhXxCpFsljHKTgVb" data-list="bullet"><strong>高并发与可追溯性</strong>：分布式 Actor 与事件溯源，确保在大规模场景中的稳定性与可审计性。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-JwpEdpagcoQVhLxztWOlVAedgGh" data-list="bullet"><strong>安全与可扩展性</strong>：云原生 DevSecOps 方案，既满足行业定制化需求，又确保合规。</li>









</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-XYS9dMhfGoF9GvxxvQhlhU1bgCd">展望未来，aevatar.ai 将持续迭代升级，致力于打造功能全面、稳健的 Agent-as-a-Service 平台，为更多行业和个人用户带来便捷而强大的 AI 协作体验。</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-MVtAdd8kgobk4Oxs6mjlPbV2gHC">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-MVtAdd8kgobk4Oxs6mjlPbV2gHC">我们诚邀社区共同参与生态建设，携手推动 AI 智能体系统的开放与成功。</div>
